Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nowhere \No"where`\, adv. [AS. n[=a]hw[=ae]r. See {No}, and {Where}.] Not anywhere; not in any place or state; as, the book is nowhere to be found. [1913 Webster]
nowhere n : an insignificant place; "he came out of nowhere" adv : not anywhere; in or at or to no place; "I am going nowhere"
